com.ibm.mobile.services.data

Interface IBMDataClientManager


  • public interface IBMDataClientManager
    The IBMDataClientManager class is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. IBMDataClientManager singleton client interface. The IBMDataClientManager is responsible for keeping the files in synch with the Cloud automatically at all times.

    The client application needs only to connect and use the normal file IO routines as if the files were being read/written locally. The IBMDataClientManager will upload/download the files asynchronously when they change.

    During the initial connection process the local files are synchronized with the Cloud. The client application will receive events of file activities, so that it can update its UI, but it won't have control over the synchronization process.

      • getStorageProvider

        IBMDataStorageProvider getStorageProvider()
        The getStorageProvider method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. returns the Storage Provider.
        Returns:
        Current attached Storage provider

        Returns:
        File directory.

      • registerCallback

        void registerCallback(IBMDataClientManagerCallback callback)
        The registerCallback method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Set the client event interface. It should be called before the connect method in order to receive all events. However it can be called at any time. Currently only one event client is supported.
        Parameters:
        callback - Client event interface to be added

      • unregisterCallback

        void unregisterCallback(IBMDataClientManagerCallback callback)
        The unregisterCallback method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Removes the client event interface. It can be called at any time. The Client will cease to receive events. Currently only one event client is supported.
        Parameters:
        callback - Client event interface to be removed

      • connect

         connect(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters,
            IBMDataStorageProvider storageProvider)
        The connect method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Connects the Cloud Manager. If a storage provider is used, it should be called only after the Storage provider is already connected, usually at the Storage Provider onStorageConnected event. It doesn't block.
        Parameters:
        parameters - Key/Value pairs - See CLClient
        storageProvider - Storage provider already connected or null to use the default storage provider
        callback - Connection callback interface

      • disconnect

         disconnect()
        The disconnect method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Disconnect Cloud Manager. It doesn't block. If a storage provider is used in the connect, it remains connected and needs to be disconnected on success.
        Parameters:
        callback - Connection callback interface

      • connected

        boolean connected()
        The connected method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Indicates if the Cloud Manager is connected.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the Cloud Manager is connected.
